author: Michael Aguilar
text: I don’t wanna smoke again, even tho I can I just wake up more sad and depression and with more voices in my head that say I fucked up. That’s because I did.

author: Michael Aguilar
text: In the end I knew I made the wrong choice, because I am no longer happy

author: Michael Aguilar
text: Honestly I’m glad I am getting out of this slump that I was in
